name: QuestionnaireAdmissionSourceOfIncome
title: Questionnaire Admission Source Of Income
description: Identifies the client's principal source of legal financial support at the time of admission.

concept.display: Public assistance - includes any state or federal financial support such as welfare, TANF, Food Stamps, Aid to the Needy Disabled, Old Age Pension, etc.
Other - Includes alimony, child support, social security payments, Workerâ€™s Compensation, unemployment benefits, etc
